data.name: CASTILLO: Shattered Mirrors
data.detailed_description:
Castillo Shattered Mirrors is a first-person shooter that combines the frantic shooting of retro FPS games with the fun exploration of the collect-a-thons that ruled the late 90s.

Your supernatural investigation goes a bit too far when you come across Dracula's castle and discover his dimension-hopping plan of dimensional domination. Battle your way through different apocalyptic dimensions, fighting hordes of monsters and finding crystal shards. Collect shards to open up new areas to Dracula's castle.

Key Features:

- Open-ended hub world, explore Dracula's castle and open up portals to shattered dimensions.
- Fast-paced action, fight a vast array of different enemies
- 11 weapons, kill monsters with different unique weapons throughout your dangerous journey.
- Over 100 different levels, filled with action-packed combat and interesting story.
- 13 different worlds to explore, recover crystal shards in space stations, abandoned snow research bases, spooky forests, and more
- Choose which levels to play in any order, you have the freedom to pick from multiple worlds to complete in the hub world.

data.short_description: Castillo Shattered Mirrors is a Gothic FPS and Collectathon. Battle legions of the undead in your quest to defeat Dracula with an arsenal of mythical weaponry. Enter dimensional gates through Dracula's castle and decide which worlds to enter, shards to collect, and bosses to defeat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: Pentium 4 @ 3 GHz/AMD 64 3200+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Mojave or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Monterey or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.0 or Greater
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.0 or Greater
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

highlighted.name: WHAT LIES BEYOND THE BASEMENT DOOR
